msg.msgText:
A "LogAutoTransfer" composite object can be updated using the "update" option of the "imaserver" command. The "LogAutoTransfer" composite object defines the settings that are used for automatic log transfers.
SYNTAX: imaserver update LogAutoTransfer help imaserver update LogAutoTransfer "Item1=value1" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver update LogAutoTransfer "UserID=test2" "Enabled=False"
Configuration items for "LogAutoTransfer" object: Destination The URL to connect to the FTP or SSH server, including protocol. Port The port to access the server. UserID The user ID to use to log in to the server. Password The password to use to log in to the server. Enabled Whether automatic log transfers are enabled. Options:True,False.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
